mosId.ui:title: MOS ID of Mos-Gateway (Sofie MOS ID)
mosId.ui:description: MOS ID of the Sofie MOS device (ie our ID). Example: sofie.mos

strict.ui:title: (Optional) Strict MOS data handling
strict.ui:description: When set, the MOS-connection will follow the MOS-specification literally (one example is that it wont accept certain strings that are longer than 128 characters)
